submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        cnt = Counter()
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            a, b = nums[i], nums[n - i - 1]
            cnt[abs(a - b)] += 1
        arr = list(sorted(cnt.items(), key=lambda i: (-i[1], i[0])))

        ans = n
        def comp (t, a, b):
            if a < b: a, b = b, a
            if a - b == t: return 0
            if k >= a - t >= 0: return 1
            if k >= b + t: return 1
            return 2
        for j in range(len(arr)):
            if j > 0 and arr[j - 1][1] == arr[j][1]:
                continue
            cur = 0
            t, v = arr[j]
            for i in range(n // 2):
                cur += comp(t, nums[i], nums[n - i - 1])
            ans = min(ans, cur)
        return ans
